Posted By: BrutalJim (4/16/2010 1:45:25 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
I personally believe this is an awesome deck engine to build around. Let me explain.  
  
Black can now drop a [Mortician Beetle](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Mortician Beetle) the turn before her. This ups the power of her deck quite a bit.  
[Tukatongue Thallid](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tukatongue Thallid) can be (effectively) sac'd twice to her ability. [Sprouting Thrinax](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Sprouting Thrinax) can be sac'd four times. Creatures can be sac'd to her even if they have summoning sickness.   
Further, there are a number of new efficient token makers, like [Nest Invader](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Nest Invader), [Awakening Zone](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Awakening Zone) and such. There are also guys like [Goblin Arsonist](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Goblin Arsonist) who have nifty effects on deaths.  
  
Constructed worthy? I wouldn't know. But it's fun as heck. And it can easily goldfish by turn 4, even without a god-draw plan.  
  
I shall dub thee JUND CARNAGE!
posts.html:

Black can now drop a Mortician Beetle the turn before her. This ups the power of her deck quite a bit.
Tukatongue Thallid can be (effectively) sac'd twice to her ability. Sprouting Thrinax can be sac'd four times. Creatures can be sac'd to her even if they have summoning sickness.
Further, there are a number of new efficient token makers, like Nest Invader, Awakening Zone and such. There are also guys like Goblin Arsonist who have nifty effects on deaths.

Constructed worthy? I wouldn't know. But it's fun as heck. And it can easily goldfish by turn 4, even without a god-draw plan.

I shall dub thee JUND CARNAGE!

Posted By: FogRaider (4/17/2010 2:13:37 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
At the pre-release, I was using her with [Pawn of Ulamog](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Pawn of Ulamog). Sac a creature to make her a 3/3, Ulamog gives you a spawn token, then sac the spawn token to make her a 5/5. Repeat until she's as big as you need her. I took down some big cards with this.  
  
She would also be fun with [Kalastria Highborn](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Kalastria Highborn) in a vampire deck.  
  
And I totally love the art.
posts.html:

She would also be fun with Kalastria Highborn in a vampire deck.

And I totally love the art.
